title: HTTPS - Phase II
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want my communication to ALWAYS be encrypted\
So I can be sure that the responses really come from More Cars and are not manipulated\
(Even when I accidentally use HTTP in my requests instead of HTTPS)
description:
* every page is accessible via HTTPS, e.g. `https://more-cars.net/brands`
* each request via HTTP is automatically redirected to HTTPS
  * e.g. `GET http://more-cars.net/brands` → `GET https://more-cars.net/brands`
  * status code `301`
* every “public“ environment needs to have a valid certificate (no self-signed)
* for local environments it is not possible to have valid certificates
  * all tools and test frameworks need to be able to handle valid and invalid certificates
* this ticket invalidates the acceptance criteria  <https://dennis-gerike.atlassian.net/browse/MCF-156> and <https://dennis-gerike.atlassian.net/browse/MCF-157> from story <https://dennis-gerike.atlassian.net/browse/MCF-128>
